Coordinated terrorist attacks in Mumbai.
Cloudburst in Dehradun causing flash floods, landslides, bridge collapse on Dehradun-Haridwar highway.
Cloudburst bats Uttarakhand, 6 buildings collapse in Chamoli district, many people missing.
Cyclone Remal causes flash floods and landslides across Northeast India; many deaths in Assam, Mizoram.
Residential building collapses in outskirts of Surat following heavy rains; 7 people killed.
Gambhira Bridge collapse in Padra, Gujarat amid heavy rains; vehicles plunge into river, dozens dead.
Sidewall of new hospital wing (Sishu Bhawan) in Bhubaneswar collapses after rain; no injuries reported.
Flash flood in Delhi due to heavy rainfall.
Building collapse in Mumbai.

Major fire at a market in Hyderabad.

Severe flooding in Chennai due to Cyclone Michaung.
Major landslide in Idukki district, Kerala.
Gridlock traffic jam on Mumbai-Pune Expressway.
Severe air pollution and smog emergency declared in Delhi.
Coordinated terrorist attacks in Mumbai.
Severe floods across Assam following prolonged rains; tens of thousands evacuated, multiple districts affected.
Wayanad landslide (Kerala) — large slope failure after heavy monsoon rains; major loss of life and displacement reported.
Six-storey residential building collapse in Surat after prolonged heavy rainfall; multiple casualties and rescue operations.
Large advertising billboard collapse in Ghatkopar, Mumbai — several fatalities and many injured; civic negligence investigated.
Severe urban flooding and waterlogging in Pune after heavy monsoon downpour, widespread transport disruption.
Cyclone Amphan aftermath — storm surge and flooding in Kolkata and neighbouring districts (note: duplicate of earlier Amphan entry for completeness).
Cyclone Amphan related coastal flooding reported in parts of Odisha (tidal surge and local inundation).
Panic and mass movement at border checkpoints during early COVID-19 lockdown in Delhi-NCR causing large crowds and transit disruptions.
Kerala floods (2018) — catastrophic flooding affecting multiple districts, major displacement and damage (historical reference).
Fire in a central Kolkata market complex causing multiple injuries and economic loss.
Severe flooding in Madhya Pradesh after incessant rain causing roads to submerge and villages inundated.
Flash floods in parts of Jammu & Kashmir during heavy rains; bridges damaged and local evacuations.
Severe urban flooding and building collapses in parts of Agra during monsoon rains.
Major fire at an industrial unit outside Nagpur causing large smoke plume and plant damage.
Coastal storm surge and localized flooding in Kochi related to an intense offshore low-pressure system.
Three-storey building collapse in Jam Khambhalia (Devbhumi Dwarka), Gujarat after heavy rains; multiple casualties reported.
Heatwave-related medical emergency declared in Lucknow with increased heatstroke hospitalizations.
Large religious gathering leads to crowding and transport shutdowns near Agra — major crowd management challenge.
